definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: You see a lot of yourself in these animals.
sentences.chinese: 你在這些動物中看到了自己的影子。

sentences.english: Job growth may also set loose what economists call “shadow demand”.
sentences.chinese: 就業增加也許能刺激經濟學家口中的“影子需求”。

sentences.english: The azure sky appeared to be so near and the clouds cast their shadows on the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 天很藍，感覺很近，雲在山上落下影子。

sentences.english: Wherever the peasant associations are powerful, there is not a trace of banditry.
sentences.chinese: 什麼盜匪，在農會勢盛地方，連影子都不見了。

sentences.english: Standing all by myself, body and shadow comforting each other.
sentences.chinese: 冷暖自知，與本人的影子相互撫慰。

sentences.english: The shout goes up as a great shadow sweeps over our boat.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨着喊聲，一個巨大的影子掃過我們的船。

sentences.english: You only see your own shadow while facing against the sun.
sentences.chinese: 當你背向太陽的時候，你只會看到自己的影子。

sentences.english: Payne's gray in thin amounts cast a shadow onto the water.
sentences.chinese: 佩恩在薄數額的灰口鑄鐵到水的影子。

sentences.english: Why on the Wedd body has Jordan's shadow?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼韋德身上有喬丹的影子？

sentences.english: She jumped at the sight of her own shadow .
sentences.chinese: 她看到自己影子時還嚇得跳了起來。

sentences.english: Look at you. Youare just a shade of my real wife.
sentences.chinese: 看看吧，你只是我妻子的一個影子。

sentences.english: The “Shadow Shogun” represents the worst side of the old politics.
sentences.chinese: “影子將軍”代表着日本舊政治最不堪的一面。

sentences.english: Shadow box with half-steps using the tips in this free video on shadow boxing.
sentences.chinese: 影子盒半使用本免費視頻的影子拳擊的技巧步驟。

sentences.english: Shadow box with half-steps using the tips in this free video on shadow boxing.
sentences.chinese: 影子盒半使用本免費視頻的影子拳擊的技巧步驟。

sentences.english: Firelight shadows began to shimmer and dance around the room.
sentences.chinese: 火光的影子開始在屋裏跳躍舞動。

sentences.english: Your shadow lingers unfeelingly at my side.
sentences.chinese: 你的影子無情在身邊徘徊。

definition: rear view/figure seen from behind/view of the back (of a person or object)
gradually proceed, gradually get further apart
